Text: ANTITRUST INTERNATIONAL FORUM THE INTERNATIONAL CARTEL WORKSHOPINTERNATIONAL FORUM THE INTERNATIONAL CARTEL WORKSHOP JANUARY FEBRUARY THE PLAZA NEW YORK The Section of Antitrust Law is pleased to invite you to our International Forum The conference is a full twoday conference featuring enforcement officials from the United States Canada the European Commission the United Kingdom and Australia defense lawyers from six jurisdictions and plaintiffs lawyers from major cartel cases in the United States The conference will be based on a hypothetical cartel case and will be conducted as demonstrations of various events in a major cartel case in several jurisdictions The first days lunch will feature an enforcement roundtable with representatives of five jurisdictions discussing cartel enforcement and the second days lunch will present a judicial roundtable featuring judges who have presided in cartel cases civil and criminal For complete conference information click on this link antitrustcartelagendapdf or contact the Section of Antitrust at The brochure has been mailed and will be delivered shortly To review the Associations policy on the use of email addresses please see privacystatementhtml If you decide that you do not wish to participate in the subscription to the electronic newsletter please contact Diane Odom at
